DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare the quality of 3 methods of ultrasound-guided brachial plexus blocks for surgical anesthesia
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Quality of Supraclavicular, Infraclavicular and Axillary Approach of Ultrasound-guided Brachial Plexus Block
DOC.criteria: ASA IIII physical status Surgery of distal arm, forearm or hand Skin infection near block injection site Allergy to local anesthetics Peripheral neuropathy upper limb INR of more than 1.4 Thrombocytopenia Opioid dependency Chronic pain syndrome Lack of orientation to person, place and time Patient refusal
